CustomField.description: This is a formula field to display consolidated deliver product
CustomField.formula: IF (Blue_Bags__c == 0,"","Blue Bags: " + TEXT(Blue_Bags__c) + BR()) + IF (Express_Bags__c == 0,"","Express Bags: " + TEXT(Express_Bags__c) + BR()) + IF (Large_Letter_Tubs__c == 0,"","Large Letter Tubs: " + TEXT(Large_Letter_Tubs__c)+ BR()) + IF (Red_Tubs__c == 0,"","Red Tubs: " + TEXT(Red_Tubs__c) + BR()) + IF (Small_Letter_Trays__c == 0,"","Small Letter Trays: " + TEXT(Small_Letter_Trays__c) + BR()) + IF (White_Bags__c == 0 ,"","White Bags: " + TEXT(White_Bags__c))
CustomField.label: Deliver Product
